amendment.description: To create millions of middle class jobs by investing in our nation's infrastructure paid for by raising revenue through closing loopholes in the corporate and international tax system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 323 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 78.

action.text: Amendment SA 323 proposed by Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S1701-1703) To create millions of middle class jobs by investing in our nation's infrastructure paid for by raising revenue through closing loopholes in the corporate and international tax system.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 323 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 78.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 323 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 78.
